values.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
values.name: http-echo-dev-vpce

after.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
after.name: http-echo-dev-vpce

github_deploy_role_arn.description: If configured, IAM role ARN to assume from GitHub Actions via OIDC

description.constant_value: Security group for interface VPC endpoints

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended)

container_port.description: Container port exposed by the app

domain_name.description: Optional custom domain name (e.g., api.example.com). If empty, no ACM/Route53 resources are created.

echo_text.description: Text returned by the service. The app requires ECHO_TEXT to be set.

enable_waf.description: Whether to attach a basic AWS WAFv2 Web ACL to the ALB

github_repo.description: GitHub repository name for OIDC trust (optional)

hosted_zone_id.description: Route53 hosted zone ID for domain_name. Required if domain_name is set.
